In England, in the seven days to 10 December, there were 297,998 new confirmed cases (527.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 03 December, there were 279,954 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 6% (18,044 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 15 December is 9,343,520 (16,522.5 cases per 100,000 population).
